name: The Long Journey
description:
You are an Iniquin.You are a species that lives in a wonderful balance within you.The balance of light and dark.Disrupting this balance will be the end of your life.But there is a legend told.A place nobody can find.The place of eternal balance.You set out to find this place that no one has ever found before.You will travel to different lands.You will meet different people along the way.You should try to maintain the balance within yourself with the decisions you make.And of course you have to protect your hunger and your health too.

Try to reach your goal by making careful choices.

---Controls---

Mouse

Note : Play in full screen for the best experience
